kjv_def: raised to life again, resurrection, rise from the dead, that should rise, rising again
strongs_def: a standing up again, i.e. (literally) a resurrection from death (individual, genitive case or by implication, (its author)), or (figuratively) a (moral) recovery (of spiritual truth)
outline:
1. a raising up, rising (e.g. from a seat)
  2. a rising from the dead
    1. that of Christ
    2. that of all men at the end of this present age
    3. the resurrection of certain ones history who were restored to life (Heb. 11:35)
